name: ident
name of the memory contex: identification information of the memory context. this field is truncated at 1024 byte

name: parent
name of the memory contex: name of the parent of this memory contex

name: level
name of the memory contex: distance from topmemorycontext in context tre

name: total_bytes
name of the memory contex: total bytes allocated for this memory contex

name: total_nblocks
name of the memory contex: total number of blocks allocated for this memory contex
